description: Still holding its deep red color, this is otherwise a wine that is now mature and ready to drink, hailing from the first vintage of the Vadio Project. It has earthy flavors of bramble and undergrowth, and a dry character that will become more pronounced over the next years. Luis Patr√£o started the organic Vadio Project to preserve the native Baga grape grown nine miles from the Atlantic Ocean in central Portugal..
